1.title: PokerPro
1.description: an innovative tool for beginner poker players, offering advanced betting strategies by calculating potential hands, predicting opponents' stronger hands, and highlighting key cards.

2.title: The NFC Lock
2.description: The project develops NFC Lock, a sustainable, real-time luggage tracking solution via an app.

3.title: Pegboard
3.description: Designed an adjustable difficulty level activity in collaboration with Shirley Ryan Ability Lab, Chicago, with a team of 4 to support traumatic brain injury patients in reinforcing motor control, problem solving, and memory rehabilitation.

4.title: Trip Planner
4.description: Developed Road Map API for optimal route finding with Dijkstra's Algorithm and Heapsort, implementing binary heaps, graphs, and dictionaries to manage and navigate intricate road networks.
